---
name: Security Review
about: Trigger Sentinel to review a change touching auth, secrets, or sensitive data
title: "[Security] "
labels: ["status:plan", "agent:sentinel"]
assignees: []
---

## Summary
Describe the feature or change and why it needs security review.

## Areas to Inspect
- Authentication / Authorization
- Secret handling
- Data exposure
- Dependencies / third-party services

## Checklist
- [ ] Sentinel notes recorded in `/docs/security/`
- [ ] Risks labelled (High / Medium / Low) with mitigation plans
- [ ] Follow-up issues opened if remediation is required

## Notes
Link relevant PRs, Plans, or research entries for context. Include any logs or traces that informed the review.
